title: Ayo Edebiri's 2025 Met Gala Hair Nods to Her Nigerian Culture
description: Three nights before the 2025 Met Gala, Ayo Edebiri and her hairstylist Jacob Aaron still hadn't decided on her final look.Â  "It [was] a work in progress, really," Aaron told Fashionista shortly before the event. "We narrowed it down last week to three looks. We tested which hair look works ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
